inclusion.criterion: peak urinary flow rate of less than 12 mL/s
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: enlarged prostate gland on digital rectal examination
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of previous surgery for BPH
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with acute urinary retention and enlarged prostate gland. He has no history of previous surgery for BPH, urinary tract infection, or prostate/bladder cancer.
